Interface SearchProvider

All Known Subinterfaces:
KeywordSearchProvider, SparqlSearchProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface SearchProvider

Marker interface for search extensions

tobias, christian.huetter

QueryResultWidget}

getShortName

java.lang.String getShortName()
The alias name of the query target (e.g., WIKI, RDF, POJO). Is used in the SearchWidget to configure the query targets.

Returns:

canHandleQueryLanguage

boolean canHandleQueryLanguage(java.lang.String queryLanguage)
Checks whether the search provider can handle specific search query language, like, e.g., "sql". Currently the query language is usually passed as a query prefix.

Parameters:
queryLanguage -
Returns:

getSupportedQueryLanguages

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSupportedQueryLanguages()
Returns a set of acceptable query language prefixes supported
